Description / Focus: Record customer payments; check daily cash balance impact
Notes / Observations: Payments can be recorded through three system paths: customer search and balance editing, SHOP ? Customer Balance, or SHOP ? Orders with filtering by status or order ID. Daily cash balance review is available only via the Admin Panel through banking account status and is restricted to the Company Owner role.

Description / Focus: Issue receipts for payments; validate proper documentation
Notes / Observations: Receipts are generated automatically and opened in a new browser tab (e.g. http://37.98.196.167:8800/cgi-bin/GR/print_agores.asp?pid=70380). The system does not provide built-in functionality to send, save, or print receipts. All such actions must be performed using the browser’s native functions.

Description / Focus: Track payments and proceeds by date and customer
Notes / Observations: Tracking of payments and proceeds by date and by customer is available in the system and functions as expected.

Description / Focus: Look up orders by ID; initialize prepayments; verify payment status
Notes / Observations: Functionality to look up orders by ID, initialize prepayments, and verify payment status is available in the system. The required actions can be completed through multiple navigation paths, which makes the overall navigation relatively complex.

Description / Focus: Record bank deposits/withdrawals; reconcile with system records
Notes / Observations: Access to banking-related features is restricted to the Company Owner role and is not available to the Accountant role.

Description / Focus: Manage customer credits; apply payments to credits automatically
Notes / Observations: Customer credits can be managed by the Accountant role; however, payments are not applied to credits automatically. A credit limit of ˆ500 is enforced for the Accountant role. Credits exceeding this limit must be applied by the Company Owner role.

Description / Focus: Verify daily cash balance; generate daily cash reports
Notes / Observations: The daily cash balance is verified at the end of the working day when the cashier is closed. The system does not provide a dedicated daily cash report; only a general daily report is available, which is not specific to cash transactions.

Description / Focus: Export financial data to Excel/PDF; track transactions by type
Notes / Observations: The system provides functionality to track financial transactions by type. Generated reports are displayed in a new browser tab and can be exported to Excel or PDF via the browser’s native functions.

Description / Focus: Reconcile PDF marketplace orders; update client balances efficiently
Notes / Observations: Marketplace orders and payments received in PDF format are not reconciled automatically with system records. Client balances must be updated manually for each order, which makes the reconciliation process time-consuming.

Description / Focus: Create purchase orders for suppliers; verify correct data entry and order creation
Notes / Observations: Purchase order creation is not supported within the VSHOP ERP. Orders are placed externally via a team collaboration platform (e.g., Microsoft Teams), and order correctness is verified through direct communication with suppliers’ managers.

Description / Focus: Edit or cancel purchase orders before confirmation; verify restrictions and notifications
Notes / Observations:
Editing, canceling, and confirming purchase orders are not supported within the VSHOP ERP. These actions are performed externally through communication with suppliers, rather than through system-based purchase order records.

No system-level restrictions, confirmations, or notifications related to purchase order changes are available.

Description / Focus: Track purchase order status (accepted, shipped, delayed); confirm status changes display properly
Notes / Observations: Tracking of purchase order status (e.g., accepted, shipped, delayed) is not supported within the VSHOP ERP. Status updates are obtained through direct communication with suppliers’ managers.

Description / Focus: Send and receive messages with suppliers regarding orders; verify message delivery and responses
Notes / Observations:
The VSHOP ERP does not provide functionality to send or receive messages with suppliers regarding orders. All order-related communication is performed externally via a team collaboration platform (e.g., Microsoft Teams).

Message delivery and supplier responses are verified outside the system.

Description / Focus: Check stock levels before placing orders; ensure accuracy of quantities and stock status
Notes / Observations: Stock levels can be reviewed by searching for an item by its ID or by reviewing warehouse stock lists using available filters.

Description / Focus: Verify notifications for low stock
Notes / Observations: The system does not provide notifications for low stock levels. Stock shortages must be identified manually by reviewing warehouse stock information.

Description / Focus: Initiate returned merchandise requests; verify linkage with suppliers and stock updates
Notes / Observations: Returned merchandise requests are recorded within the system using the RMA module. Communication with suppliers regarding return requests is performed externally via a team collaboration platform, consistent with other supplier-related interactions.

Description / Focus: Track service requests related to purchased products; ensure clear status tracking and closure
Notes / Observations:
The system does not provide functionality to track service requests related to purchased products. Status tracking and closure of service requests are not available within the system.

Service status updates are obtained externally through direct communication with courier services.

Description / Focus: Compare prices of the same product from multiple suppliers; test response speed
Notes / Observations:
Direct comparison of prices and availability for the same product across multiple suppliers within the VSHOP ERP requires synchronization with suppliers’ websites or XML stock feeds.

Such synchronization is not available by default and requires additional development and ongoing maintenance. Integration complexity varies by supplier, as some supplier websites are protected against automated parsing.

Description / Focus: Access supplier contact info; verify ability to reach managers quickly via provided data
Notes / Observations:
Supplier contact information is available within the system through dedicated supplier profiles (similar to customer profiles).

For most suppliers (excluding local suppliers), profiles contain contact details, agreement documentation, information on credit lines, delivery times, pricing, and other relevant data

Description / Focus: View sales statistics and reports; verify accuracy and data completeness
Notes / Observations: The system provides functionality to generate sales statistics and reports. Generated reports are displayed in a new browser tab. Further actions such as saving, printing, or sharing reports are performed using the browser’s native controls, as no built-in system functionality is provided for these actions.

Description / Focus: Track order volumes and revenue by day, week, and month; validate date filters and data grouping
Notes / Observations:
The system provides functionality to track order volumes and revenue by day, week, and month. Revenue tracking is available only to the Company Owner role.

Date filtering is implemented using the browser’s native calendar control.

Data grouping options depend on the report type. Order-related reports support grouping by supplier and product category. Revenue reports support grouping by bill type (e.g., B2B, B2C).

Description / Focus: Review financial summaries (payments, balances, credits); confirm consistent totals across modules
Notes / Observations: Financial summaries for payments, balances, and credits are supported by the system and are accessible only to the Company Owner role.

Description / Focus: Monitor user activities and access logs; ensure visibility and accuracy of user actions
Notes / Observations: The system supports monitoring of user activities and access logs. Navigation through activity logs is limited. The interface does not provide calendar-based or date filtering; navigation is performed via pagination only. For quicker access to specific dates, users manually modify URL parameters.

Description / Focus: Receive and view notifications of critical system errors; test visibility and alert timing
Notes / Observations: Notifications for critical system errors are not supported within the system.

Description / Focus: Analyze product performance (sales, returns, popularity); confirm report generation and accuracy
Notes / Observations:
The system does not provide built-in functionality to generate reports for product performance analysis (e.g., sales, returns, popularity).

Product performance analysis is performed manually. System users may review product performance data directly in external marketplaces for products sold through those channels.

Description / Focus: Review customer feedback and complaints; verify sorting, filtering, and response functionality
Notes / Observations:
The system does not provide functionality to record, manage, or review customer feedback and complaints.

Customer reviews and feedback are available only through external channels where they are submitted (e.g., Google Business, marketplaces, email).

Description / Focus: Review website traffic statistics, trends, and report export options
Notes / Observations: The system provides limited website traffic statistics. The only traffic-related data available directly in the VSHOP ERP is user traffic grouped by source (e.g., direct website visits, search engine results pages, marketplaces).

Description / Focus: Verify news updates and banners reflect current promotions; test editing and publication workflows
Notes / Observations: The system does not provide functionality to manage or publish news updates and promotional banners.

Description / Focus: Create, edit, or deactivate user accounts; verify proper access rights and updates
Assign roles and permissions to users; confirm users can access only relevant modules
Track user login activity; ensure logs are accurate and reflect all actions
Reset passwords and manage authentication settings; verify secure access and proper updates
Review failed login attempts and security alerts; confirm timely notifications and correct tracking
Generate reports of user activity and role assignments; validate report accuracy and readability
Record phone calls and in-shop communications between employees and customers; ensure notes are stored properly
Record internal communications; verify documentation of interactions and conflicts
Add, edit, or remove products; verify updates reflect correctly across the system
Categorize products by type, manufacturer, etc.; test filtering and category-based search
Upload product images and descriptions; verify correct display and metadata storage
Update product prices in bulk; confirm data integrity and proper application of new price lists
Compare product prices with marketplace benchmarks; verify synchronization and comparison accuracy
Export price lists to Excel; confirm correct format and completeness
Manage supplier and manufacturer information; validate add/edit/delete functionality and data consistency
Receive and review supplier catalog updates; verify import process and system reflection of new products
Review product sales statistics; ensure correct aggregation and report filtering
Track product returns and defects; confirm proper linking to suppliers and accurate status updates
Create new sales orders; verify workflow from product selection to order confirmation
Edit or cancel orders before finalization; test order locking and data consistency
Generate invoices and receipts; verify document formatting and data accuracy
Create customized offers (hardware bundles, configurations); ensure data saving and preview accuracy
Look up offers by ID; validate search performance and result accuracy
Search for customers by name, phone, or ID; verify search filters and results consistency
Create new customer profile (client record); validate required fields and data saving
Look up orders by ID; verify quick access, navigation, and historical accuracy. Cancel existing orders
Apply credits or discounts to orders; test calculation correctness and visibility in totals
Track outstanding payments; verify balance updates and reminder generation
Communicate with customers via portal (messages, chat); test delivery, notification, and response display
Log customer requests or complaints; ensure categorization and escalation flow works properly
Check stock availability before confirming orders; validate stock synchronization
Notify Warehouse Manager upon sale; verify real-time stock update and notification handling
Review daily sales summary; confirm calculation accuracy and date-based filtering
Manage returns and exchanges; validate correct workflows and policy compliance
Accept defective products under warranty; verify intake workflow and mandatory data fields
Issue RMA numbers; confirm uniqueness, proper linking to orders/customers
Document condition of returned item (photos, notes); test file upload and evidence tracking
Send defective items back to producer; verify shipping documentation and status update
Track RMA statuses (sent, under repair, returned); confirm accurate state transitions
Diagnose stock items before sale; ensure defective items cannot be sold
Repair returned products; verify repair logging, cost tracking, and part usage
Record internal repairs in system; confirm visibility in product history and reports
Send items to external service centers; verify dispatch and tracking fields
Track external service jobs; confirm return and update statuses
Log customer support requests; ensure categorization and searchability
Provide technical assistance (phone, email, in-shop); verify communication logging
Search past support interactions; confirm filtering and history accuracy
Notify Warehouse Manager when defective item received; validate notification delivery and stock update
Update Seller when product repaired/replaced; test notification visibility
Share defect trends with Product Manager; confirm report generation and access
Generate warranty and repair reports; validate filtering, export, and accuracy
Keep statistics on repair times and return rates; confirm KPI calculation and visualization
Monitor current stock levels; verify accuracy and synchronization with sales and purchasing modules
Update stock quantities after receiving shipments; ensure data consistency and traceability
Flag low-stock items; confirm alerts and automatic notifications to Buyer
Mark items as sold and update real stock; validate automatic stock deduction after sales
Check purchase orders from Buyer; verify product details, quantities, and storage location assignment
Process outgoing orders; ensure order picking, packing, and shipping status updates
Generate stock reports; validate completeness, export options, and data accuracy
